item.description:
This is an invite from the Manchester area Wine group. Please come join us for this event.

 

Who's hosting? diane, Marie LaBier, Steven Berthiaume

How to find us: It's a clubhose, look for the signs

Let's join In a Summer Celebration of Steve and Marie's nuptuals w/ one of our famous potluck and wine pairings!

Bring your favorite dish or dessert to share and A bottle of wine to pair

It's summer and since Love is in the air, might I suggest sparkling wine or champagne?  Both pair well w/ food and desserts.

 http://wine.about.com/od/champagne/a/Chamagnefood.htm

 http://www.wineintro.com/food/charts/champagne.html

More about the Happy Couple: 

"We will be married on June 25th. We met on an online dating service. Don't laugh; it worked for us! lol Marie consented to meet me for coffee, but in the week preceeding our first date we communicated via email. The details of our date changed over the course of that week from coffe at Startbuck's (my choice) to coffee at Dunkins (marie's choice) to dinner at 99 and then a movie (we saw Reds)."  

That is wonerful!  And when you think about... we all met each other online too!!  It's a great thing!

* The jukebox at the clubhouse is working!  Free music! *

Feeling lucky?  We will be raffling off bottles of wine, gift baskets and a 50/50.  100 percent of the proceeds will be donated to an SMA (spinal muscular atrophy) fund!   So bring cash!!

*Remember:* Only you can prevent DWI.  Please drink responsible and drive safe!  We care about our members!
item.how_to_find_us: we will meet at the clubhouse
item.name: Get together and Celebrate
